title: Prohibits the sale, rental or display of indecent material within 200 feet of a school or place of worship
summary: Prohibits any person, firm, or corporation from selling, offering for sale, renting, offering to rent, or displaying indecent material within two hundred feet of any public or private primary or secondary school, church, synagogue, or other place of worship.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting the sale or rental of indecent material near a school or place of worship
